{{ModuleFunction|MTA-MySQL}}
Sets the field cursor of a result in the given field offset. The offset must be a value between '''1''' and '''[[/Modules/MTA-MySQL/mysql_num_fields.md|mysql_num_fields()]]'''.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
int mysql_field_seek ( MySQLResult result, int offset )
</syntaxhighlight>
===Required arguments===
* '''result:''' A valid MySQL result
* '''offset:''' A valid field offset

===Returns===
The previous field cursor.
